website_summaries.verdict: Customers generally appreciate this reliable, durable machine.
cons: Complicated setup instructions leave many first-time users confused

customer_reviews.title: OK, but sometimes hangs up
customer_reviews.text: Fast, but occasionally it won’t print a pdf file from my generic pdf program (I print wirelessly) and hangs the printer up. I haven’t quite figured how to reset it immediately. The Win10 printer app won’t delete the job. But then mysteriously it will start working again some time later. About 1 in 20 odd docs have done this. I think clearing the job out from the printer front panel might be the secret, but this shouldn’t be happening at all. But it’s fast, and decent print quality. But it does smell like a laser printer too - probably ozone - but they all smell a bit.
customer_reviews.author: BooksnStuff

customer_reviews.title: Scanning via USB cable works eventually
customer_reviews.text: Very nice printer and scanner. Was a pain getting the scanner to work via USB cable to Window 10 laptop that does not have a DVD. Downloaded and installed the drivers 4 times from the Canon Website exactly the same way before it finally worked. Also, the directions are wrong for finding the serial number to register it. The serial number is available via the touchpad instead of being printed on the label on the machine. The customer support folks are good, but be prepared to hang on the line for many minutes.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Great MFP, Works Perfectly for me
customer_reviews.text: I've long been a fan of Canon laser MFP devices. This specific model prints fast, first page out is very fast as well. Scanning quality is excellent, much better than I anticipated despite that I used a previous generation I was already happy with. I mostly use the scan to SMB, fast and great quality. For years I have used Adobe Acrobat Pro to scan, but that won't be needed any more. The crispest, most detailed B&W and color scans's I've seen on a MFP, blows away my previous Canon 6100 series. Can recommend this one enough, especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Codelo

customer_reviews.title: Like this printer- bought another!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Brother All In One printers for my office, but had problems with the durability of the last two that I had purchases. Decided to try one of these instead, after seeing good reviews, and I am much happier with it. I liked the Brothers until they stopped working properly- but this works very nicely, and I like the touch screen. It is on a wired network, so I can't speak to the wifi functions. Works fine as a networked printer. I love the easy ability to scan documents to email. When I saw one here at a good price again, I bought a second one for home, to replace my Brother printer there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Hate the new scanning software - bring back the 4.9 Toolbox
customer_reviews.text: Slow first page print but fast print overall. Hate the new Scangear scanning software - the Toolbox 4.9 version that came with my 6160dw was much better. With new scan software, can't name the target folder/file on the fly - have to go to settings to change the filename & have to "name" the target folder which doesn't work when I have 70+ clients with "2019" folders. Tried calling their "help desk", was put on perpetual hold... Overall, printer seems good but scan software is terrible - any efficiency gained from one-pass duplex scanning is lost in fighting with the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R Pinkleton

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality dept.
customer_reviews.text: I think it all starts when your quality dept (ie; the last ones to inspect it before it goes out the door to the customer) lets defected items slip by. Secondly, their phone assistance staff do not seem to know anything about their product. This thing is always going down, I think I will need to replace it soon. That is what I get for getting the all in one. Also, it has this long pause between the time I hit print, and the printer actually starts working. Normally I would blame that on connection, but my last printer didn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Chryssy

customer_reviews.title: Great All-In-One
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to replace a Samsung BW Laser All-In-One. I have to say that I can't be more impressed. especially given the inexpensive price. Would highly recommend. The only suggestion for improvement would be for Canon to included a more detailed scanning software package. Duplex scanning is great and fast, but can't remove blank pages with included software. I am using a third party scan software, ReadIris 14 Corporate.
customer_reviews.author: RPatt3

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly inexpensive, high quality 3-in-1 unit
customer_reviews.text: We use this unit primarily as a copier, and it does a great job. It even has a reliable feeder. It's on the network, but when I need high-quality scanner I use a fujutsu unit attached to one of our home computers, so I can't comment on scan quality. It is certainly a timesaver whenever we need to fax. In the past, I had to scan papers in as a pdf, then drag to doximity internet fax. This is a convenience. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AJP

customer_reviews.title: BLACK AND WHITE
customer_reviews.text: Although the description on the CANON site says BLACK AND WHITE, this description does not. 1 star for lack of transparency.
customer_reviews.author: mop335

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised so far
customer_reviews.text: Printers of all brands tend to be finicky with common glitches. After using Epson brand for years and becoming very frustrated with the many problems, I finally decided to try a Canon. So far, this has worked great and I have had it for about 3 months. The wifi works with multiple devices and remotely. No major complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: BlakeB

customer_reviews.title: Nice printer for the price
customer_reviews.text: This printer serves its purpose. There aren’t many instructions so you have to rely on Canon customer service to get things set up. Once I was up and rolling, everything seems a-ok. I do wish i would’ve gotten a dual tray printer, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Yammit

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!  I didn't know a printer could be this good.
customer_reviews.text: I would have upgraded my printer years ago if I knew it would be this good. Super fast, prints from every device on my network and even wireless from my phone and I'm still on the toner that came with it after hundreds of pages. The scanner is fantastic too. It knows if it sheet feeder or flatbed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The print quality is amazing, speed is phenomenal, the setup is easy. This is a great machine. The only change needed is to be in color, but I knew what I was getting into. It's a great machine and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Teyanna Necole

customer_reviews.title: Slowest printer I have owned
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars for the quality of the print. 3 stars for the speed of the printing 0-1 star for the fact that the printer has no memory. You have to wait for a page to print before sending another page to be printed. This is VERY frustrating and makes printing process Extremely slow.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Pochardt

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Started having trouble a few weeks ago. Now it won't even power on - totally dead. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: MrBball

customer_reviews.title: Nice once setup, initial setup was a beast lol
customer_reviews.text: mixed feeling with what was needed to setup but once it got setup it started working. There are some youtube videos on how to get the wifi working. But it is a nice printer.
customer_reviews.author: ClLy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent multifunction
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent multifunction printer, copier, scanner, fax machine. I also bought the extra tray which goes underneath and the tray has a larger paper capacity. They should have made the original tray as large.
customer_reviews.author: Renzi

customer_reviews.title: This is our "Work Horse" printer
customer_reviews.text: We are a small business with limited resources. The Canon ImageClass family gives good value for our money and provides all the features we need to function. The last one we had lasted 6 years before we had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Legge

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: The main tray is way too small and needs refilling too much . Tried everything to get it to give me a fax confirmation and it just won't . Send a fax and who knows of it went! If you have a business run from this all in one as fast as you can!
customer_reviews.author: sonny

customer_reviews.title: Get help from Canon right away in order to set it up.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to set up. The driver CD included with it is of no use. Need to install driver from the Canon website. Printing is cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kashanchi

customer_reviews.title: it is good for home office
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my wife home work, every thing is good unless there is no way to cancel when you copy something but paper jam, so I have shutdown all machine to make it work again
customer_reviews.author: Anvil Lin

customer_reviews.title: DYSFUNCTIONAL.
customer_reviews.text: Once i press print i have to wait 1 minute before it prints. its the worst printer i've ever dealt with in my life. Terrible. PLEASE DO NOT BUY AND SAVE YOURSELF A HEADACHE.
customer_reviews.author: itta

customer_reviews.title: Very Fast
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. The scanning is incredibly fast & does both sides and once. The printing is very fast as well. It’s on the big side if you’re using for personal use, but if you do a lot of printing & scanning or copying it gets the job done very well in an expeditious fashion.
customer_reviews.author: William D.

customer_reviews.title: This printer is simply the best.
customer_reviews.text: Should have started with this printer years ago. No more ink jets.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Used it for 2 times now
customer_reviews.text: It is very small. When i got the package i thought the size was as a normal copier, but after you unbox it it looks very small. The touch lcd screen is from really cheap material so you need to touch and slide 2 or 3 times to get the job done. It's easy to install, I did everything my self.
customer_reviews.author: Oighen

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a reasonably priced copier/fax/scanner. So far I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chinchin

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent printer. I have it on my office. High quality prints and very low cost of ink
customer_reviews.author: Yeisly Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: works great, compact, fast. Cartridges should be cheaper but that will happen over time.
customer_reviews.author: WK

customer_reviews.title: Cannon printer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent printer, very fast. However set up in the beginning a bit hard but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Saf

customer_reviews.title: First couple of weeks, Lovin it
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace an older Canon MFP and this one seems to be doing a great job so far. Nice MFP.
customer_reviews.author: T. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Great printer!
customer_reviews.text: This printer wont disappoint you & it comes with a cartridge preinstalled. No need to buy any additional.
customer_reviews.author: Arty

customer_reviews.title: Sets Up Beautifully, First Page Prints Fast
customer_reviews.text: We just received it at our office. We followed the instructions in the video and everything worked. The first page prints very fast. It's a little loud, but that's very minor to us.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: User interface is easy to use and easy to install. The iPhone functionality is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very fast
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with how quickly it prints! Great quality and user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very dependable
customer_reviews.text: great for light desk office work. duplex printing is great to have. scan is a great feature
customer_reviews.author: sophie's dad

customer_reviews.title: Great Laser Printer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect. WIFI Printing is excellent. Great quality and price
customer_reviews.author: JOHN D GORDON

customer_reviews.title: Fast printing.
customer_reviews.text: This printer is so fast! Its company and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Patti P

product_meta.title: Canon imageCLASS MF424dw Monochrome Printer with Scanner Copier & Fax, Amazon Dash Replenishment Ready
product_meta.description: Style:Printer OnlyDesigned for small and medium-size businesses, the image CLASS MF424dw balances speedy performance, minimal maintenance, and the ability to add an extra paper tray. A 5" color touchscreen delivers an intuitive user experience and can be customized by a device administrator to simplify many daily tasks.PRINTING METHOD : Laser Beam Printing
feature_bullets: Save 10% on all ink reorders with Dash Replenishment. Upon activation your printer measures ink levels and places smart reorders when you are running low. No subscription fees. Cancel anytime.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
